statements: DELETE FROM agent_tasks WHERE task_id = 100 AND agent_name = 'John Smith';
DELETE FROM agent_logs WHERE log_time < '2022-01-01 12:00:00' AND log_id IN (SELECT log_id FROM agent_tasks WHERE task_status = 'completed');
DELETE FROM tasks WHERE task_name = 'Task A';
DELETE FROM agents WHERE agent_name = 'John Smith';
DELETE FROM job_logs WHERE log_time < '2022-01-01' AND message LIKE '%error%';
DELETE FROM training_parameters WHERE agent_id = 5 AND param_name = 'learning_rate';
